comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.0; de-DE; rv:1.9.1.17) Gecko/20110121 Firefox/3.5.17 (.NET CLR 3.5.30729)
Build Identifier: 3.1.9

see steps to reproduce

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create an account of the RSS type
2. Perform few subscriptions of rss feeds for this account
   All subscriptions distributed over more than one account's folders
3. In one folder of your choice adapt the selection and order of shown columns
    in the message list pane.
4. Do Message list pane headline context menu >> Click to select columns to
    display >>> Apply columns to... >>> Folders and its children  >>> your RSS 
   account's root
5. Subscribe one more rss feed within the root of your rss account
   
Actual Results:  
Columns selection and order for the last subscribed feed deviate from those applied for rss folders created by predecessor subscriptions.

Expected Results:  
Columns selection and order identical with those applied previously to the root of the rss account.

no additional information

comments.author: reply2discussion@googlemail.com
alta88@fixall.com
comments.text: column order seems to be preserved for new folders, but not selected columns.  anyway, this is not specific to feed accounts.
